title: fix(upload): add custom serde name for aws storage
body: Fixes #258

title: chore: update dependencies
body:
Updates `bundlr` to v0.2.0 to get away from the OpenSSL requirement and bumps other non-Solana and Metaplex packages.

Closes #176.

title: Fix: sugar collection set arguments
body:
Removes the clap macro. Didn't realize this was possible before

Before: 
```bash
sugar collection set --collection-mint <MintId>
```

After: 
```bash
sugar collection set <MintId>
```

title: Update CI to undo matrix refactor
body: This should make CI slightly faster

title: Add rustfmt.toml and reformat imports
body: This adds a currently unstable nightly feature of rustfmt. It is currently basically stable. For this I believe we should still add this is and modify the github actions to use nightly for the formatting job. It is very easy to do this locally. Just running `rustup override set nightly`, `cargo fmt --all`, and then resetting the toolchain with `rustup ovverride unset` should allow quick formatting fixes to comply with this. I think it is overall beneficial for consistency's sake.

title: allow none in go live date
body: Prior to this fix there was no way to set go live date to none using sugar. This adds support in the config creator and in the parser

title: refactor: fix new clippy lints added in 1.62
feat(show): add option to show and log unminted indices
body:
Added `--unminted` flag to `show` command to print and log the list of unminted indices. The list is also logged.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/729235/176729264-4304f4f2-a85b-4831-833c-754710d8f07d.png)

title: feat(logging): add solana-logger
body: I tested it on a few commands and the default value of `info` doesn't seem to produce messages (which would interrupt our normal std output). If we find it does we can shift the default level to `error` or turn it off by default.

title: refactor(upload): added uploader trait
body:
Improved the way that new upload methods can be implemented:

- [x] Creation of a new `Uploader` trait to be implemented by all upload methods.
- [x] Threading logic was moved from each upload method to a new `ParallelUpload` trait. This avoids code duplication and simplifies the implementation.
- [x] Moved upload method implementation under a new methods sub-module. New methods only (or ideally) need to add/modify files from this module.
- [x] Refactor nft.storage upload to improve performance (uploading batches of files)

title: use serde snake_case instead of custom serializer
Add limit on concurrent uploads
body: This PR adds a limit on the number of concurrent uploads for the `nft_storage` method to avoid reaching the rate limit.

title: Feat: Automatically mint collection NFT if in assets folder
fix(update): update command was not updating seller fee basis points
Bump version for hidden settings fix
body: Also adds /.idea to .gitignore to play nicer with intellij

title: NFT Storage as Upload Backend
body:
### Goal
Candy Machine assets can be saved to [nft.storage](https://nft.storage/).

### Changes
- Add `NftStorage` upload backend
- Store NFT Storage authentication token on sugar config when storage backend selected.

```
[1/4] 🗂  Loading assets
Found 10 image/metadata pair(s), uploading files:
+--------------------+
| images    |     10 |
| metadata  |     10 |
+--------------------+

[2/4] 🖥  Initializing upload
▪▪▪▪▪ Connected

[3/4] 📤 Uploading image files

Sending data: (Ctrl+C to abort)
[00:00:04] Upload successful ███████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████ 10/10

[4/4] 📤 Uploading metadata files

Sending data: (Ctrl+C to abort)
[00:00:02] Upload successful ███████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████ 10/10

10/10 image/metadata pair(s) uploaded.

✅ Command successful.
```

title: feat(bundlr): added bundlr command
body:
New `bundlr` commands to interact with Bundlr network:
- `balance` displays the balance on bundlr
- `withdraw` retrieves the funds on bundlr

Closes #227

title: chore: remove artifact zipping in build action
body:
This PR makes sure to do the following

1. Github Actions (build when tagged) does not bundle the artifacts anymore
2. The install script is changed to download the direct binary instead of fetching the zip and unzipping it later in the commands.

Closes #193

1. Adding the animation url in the `properties.files` on the metadata files
2. There is now an option to run a test with animation files directly

Fixes #202

title: bugfix: Remove placeholder auth delegation
body: The following changes have been done 1. Remove WL burn authority / SPL transfer authority delegation (approval and revoke) and instead keep the payer as both 2. Fix a bug of price calculation (where it was 10 ^ 9 even for SPL treasury mode), by creating a parser function ### Testing tx - [here](https://explorer.solana.com/tx/347revDkEyLXpftgs8SEL31G9BsszuoV1jhsv3UnxjF52ag56NmCq9iqGT6MU9NpNfKTUaV14x9oiT8WmpXei4Zj?cluster=devnet) ### Token changes screenshot The balance changes are as follows 1. NFT token 2. SPL Treasury Token credit 3. WL token burn 4. SPL Treasury Token debit Closes #207

refactor(create-config, upload): improve serde metadata errors

Improves metadata deserialization errors to include more information. Fixes #201 . 

Errors now look like this:

```
samuel@Samuels-MacBook-Pro sugar_test2 % sugar create-config
[1/2] 🍬 Sugar interactive config maker

Check out our Candy Machine config docs to learn about the options:
  -> https://docs.metaplex.com/candy-machine-v2/configuration


🛑 Error running command (re-run needed): Failed to read metadata file: assets/0.json with error: missing field `name` at line 34 column 1
```

title: add description how to curl install the binary with install script
body:
Downloading a shell script from github with curl and exectuing it certainly is not best practice. 

It will be the easiest installation method for users new to the terminal.

title: refactor(interruption): handling interruptions in non-iterative operations
body:
Couple of improvements to how `Ctrl+C` interruptions are handled:
- on non-iterative operations, a single `Ctrl+C` will exit the program immediately
- on iterative operations (`upload` and `deploy`), the first `Ctrl+C` signal that the user wants to abort the operation and the command has time to save any data; a second `Ctrl+C` exits the program immediately

The interruption variable was renamed to better reflect its use.

title: refactor(upload): provide a better error for a missing asset dir
docs(readme): simplify readme
body: full docs are on docs.metaplex.com; simplify the readme to bare minimum experienced devs need to get started to avoid redundancy and prevent us from having to update docs in two places

title: refactor(verify): print link to cm on solaneyes; better error msg
Exit on second interruption
body: Interrupts any command after a second `Ctrl+C`

title: Removed interruption handler
body: Removed interruption handler to avoid conflicts during `launch` command.

title: Changed date mask for input
body: Change the date mask from `DD-MM-YYYY` to `YYYY-MM-DD` for date input.

title: chore(build.yml): fix runner OS check for macOS
Added flag to specify candy machine id
body: The candy machine id can be specified as an optional `--candy-machine` flag

title: Updated whitelistMintSettings and endSettings details
body: Highlights the differences in `whitelistMintSettings` and `endSettings`.

title: Moved spl-token mint option
body: Moved the spl-token option to be first, so the question about SOL treasure account comes before all the other optional settings.

title: Added client side validation on mint
body:
The changes to the Candy Machine program means that we do not get transaction errors in many mint cases - we get charge the `BOT_FEE` and the transaction succeeds.

This PR adds client side validation to mint so we do not send invalid transactions and report the error to the user.

Fixes #167

1. Added Sam's comments from the docs
2. Changed the version name from `alpha` to `beta` for the public release

title: Fixed SOL symbol on output
body: SOL symbol was not displaying correctly on ubuntu.

title: Added candy machine id parameter
body: Both `mint` and `update` commands now accept a candy machine parameter, allowing using these commands without a cache file.

title: Improved cache file synchronization in upload/deploy
body:
Couple of improvements:
1. cache file is synchronized periodically instead of at each tx completion; this improves the performance for large cache file sizes
2. added `ctrl+c` handler to gracefully stop the upload/deploy

title: Refactored to use candy machine pubkey
body: Using the Pubkey `ID` for the candy machine from the mpl_candy_machine program instead of a defined constant. There is also a straightforward way to use a custom candy machine id.

body: closes #148

body: closes #89

title: Allows discount price to be set to null
body: The discount price can be set to `null` in whitelist mint settings, which represents the case that there is no discount  price.

title: Improved error handling for mint command
Formatting launch command output
body:
Few improvements to `launch` command:
1. formatted output inline with other commands
2. added a "title" for each step of the launch
3. propagate errors with `?` so the main function can display them the same way as other commands
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/729235/165400455-19fc7bce-be6d-4024-856d-c8d0a4256d42.png)
